headline: Morning Movers: Stocks jump as court blocks tariffs, Nvidia strong again
summary: Stock market futures are rallying, buoyed by a federal court ruling that blocked several of President Donald Trump’s import tariffs. This decision has lifted investor sentiment while Nvidia’s first-quarter earnings report further fueled market optimism. In other corporate news, Tesla shares rose over 2% after CEO Elon Musk announced he would step down from his government role at the Department of Government Efficiency to refocus on his companies. Commodity markets are reacting to the tariff news
